attributes.action: Protection of children and vulnerable adults by regulation of billboard advertising.
attributes.additional_details:
The amount of disturbing imagery on billboards in increasing.
     Images of crash victims, horror films, television programmes
     that are after watershed etc. should not be viewed by children.
      As we have no control over billboards we are subjecting the
     nations children to these images which have a dramatic effect
     on young minds who cannot distinguish reality from graphic
     enhancement or fiction.  Parents are encouraged to obey
     watersheds on Tv, film ratings at the cinema etc. but are
     expected too accept this ,generally, much more graphic use of
     media.  Our children hide their eyes, have nightmares and are
     disturbed by images such as this and we have no power to
     protect them.  The effects of this need to be researched if the
     government support the continuation of this.  We the
     undersigned would prefer that protocol for image approval is
     sought before billboard advertising can go ahead.
